address.long: Jl. Pasir Raya No.23 PPI Manyar

greeting.text: I am a versatile professional with experience in tourism, hospitality, and web development.
As a Tour Leader and Guide, I've managed logistics, budgets, and customer satisfaction for trips across East Java, including Bromo Mountain.
My time as a kitchen crew member strengthened my skills in teamwork, time management, and inventory handling in a fast-paced environment.
With a growing passion for tech, I'm now expanding into Fullstack Web Developmentâ€”combining service excellence with problem-solving and modern digital solutions.
